    fragment(string, encoding = nil) click to toggle source

    Parse a fragment from string in to a NodeSet.

    # File lib/nokogiri/html.rb, line 29
def fragment string, encoding = nil
  HTML::DocumentFragment.parse string, encoding
end
    parse(thing, url = nil, encoding = nil, options = XML::ParseOptions::DEFAULT_HTML, &block) click to toggle source

    Parse HTML. Convenience method for Nokogiri::HTML::Document.parse

    # File lib/nokogiri/html.rb, line 23
def parse thing, url = nil, encoding = nil, options = XML::ParseOptions::DEFAULT_HTML, &block
  Document.parse(thing, url, encoding, options, &block)
end
